hero.title: Anna Heliasz — Full-Stack JavaScript Developer
hero.subtitle: I create modern, efficient JS/TS applications, sometimes combining my linguistics background with AI features to improve user experience.

sayright.title: SayRight
sayright.value: Pronunciation practice with IPA, native recordings, and concise AI feedback.
sayright.note: AI feedback is in its beta phase.

lolture.title: Lolture
lolture.value: A social site for memes/videos with voting and categories.
lolture.note: May load slowly on free hosting.

eitheror.title: EitherOr
eitheror.value: A fun web app where users answer 'Would you rather' questions and see live stats.
eitheror.note: This is not a fully fledged website, just a small demo.

about.title: About
about.p1: I am Anna Heliasz — a Full-Stack JavaScript Developer. I build modern, functional web applications and constantly work on expanding my skills.
about.p2: On the frontend, I work with React and TypeScript; on the backend, with Node.js/Express. Depending on the project, I use MongoDB or PostgreSQL. I am experienced with Firebase authentication, REST APIs, and deployments on Netlify and Railway.
about.p3: I have built projects such as SayRight (a pronunciation app with IPA, native speaker recordings, and AI feedback), a memes/videos platform with voting, and a job application tracker. My projects focus on clean code, accessibility, and performance.
about.p4: Before programming, I taught English, which allows me to combine technical skills with experience in creating intuitive interfaces in EN/PL/ES.
about.p5: I use AI only when it genuinely enhances project quality and I can fully control its operation and costs.
